mapper.insert: insert into ftp_vol( user_no, category_no, title, content, tel, email, start_dt, end_dt, start_time, end_time, total_cnt, approval) values( #{userNo}, #{category.no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{limitNum}, #{status})
mapper.select: select v.vol_no, v.title, v.content, v.tel, v.email, v.start_dt, v.end_dt, datediff(date_format(v.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(v.start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')) total_dt, datediff(date_format(v.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')) remain_dt, v.start_time, v.end_time, v.total_cnt, u.id owner_id, u.name owner_name, c.category_title category_title, f.filepath from ftp_vol v inner join ftp_user u on v.user_no=u.user_no inner join ftp_category c on v.category_no=c.category_no left outer join ftp_vol_file f on v.vol_no=f.vol_no order by vol_no desc
